TopicTitle: What about more interessting stuff on Planets?

Articles.Content:
Hello,

now we have a bunch of new biomes on all Planets in upcoming version 0.90. But on the Planets we will found as huge dessert in the main planet color, what you think about make planet surfaces more interessting:

a contract like:

"We found a Strange structur on Duna, take a look of it"

"Our Scientists found a Cavesystem on Eve, bring us some Surface samples (5 Tons)"

Some Random structures (like rock formations https://www.google.de/search?q=strange+rock+formations&biw=1920&bih=969&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ei=gQaPVOP7BYbpywOTnYKgCA&ved=0CAYQ_AUoAQ [like this]) Maybe they could ramdomly generated at the first discover and saved for a later visit.

(sorry for my odd english, im not a native speaker)

if the contract is ever "Bring back 5 tons of rocks from the surface of eve", I will blow up my R&D department.

but I get the point, something to more easily break up the barren wastelands of other planets.
